role.title: Role â€” Audio
role.desc: Responsible for sound effects, implementation and mixing: gameplay SFX palette, UI, crowd/ambience layers and integration and in-engine mix for clarity during fast-paced action. System reacts to race states and player events.

gameplay.title: Gameplay Highlights
gameplay.li1: Responsive SFX tied to player actions and obstacles
gameplay.li2: Mix hierarchy optimized for clarity (1â€“4 players)
gameplay.li3: Non-intrusive dynamic layers during intense moments

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.desc: All audio was integrated in Unreal Engine with attention to performance and system flexibility.
implementation.li2: Efficient asset organization, consistent volume levels

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.desc: My team are wonderful people! We worked so well together that we decided to add an extra element to the game â€” we recorded original voicelines for the granny characters. Each granny has her own unique character and voice, which adds charm and humor to the gameplay.
